channel.title: Unit of Work on Coding Odyssey
channel.description: Recent content in Unit of Work on Coding Odyssey

item.title: The Repository and Unit of Work pattern
item.description: Yes, i know not this again. Is this not the one millionth time that someone blogs about that? Yes, yes and yes but… It is always good to repeat things and we all know that “Repetition is the mother of learning, the father of action, which makes it the architect of accomplishment.” ― Zig Ziglar There are still implementations out there that might benefit from this… So let’s start with some definitions.
